entry.title: HiRes-CESM Interactive Dashboard Example
entry.content:
In this example, our goal is to create an interactive dashboard, using images already output on a remote server.

We are specifically interested in looking at plots created using the HighRes-CESM-Analysis repository.
entry.summary: In this example, our goal is to create an interactive dashboard, using images already output on a remote server.We are specifically interested in looking at plots created using the HighRes-CESM-Analysis repository.https://img.shields.io/badge/%E2%86%91_Deploy_to-Heroku-7056bf.svg
